title: Mint

fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- Traditional.
- Each owned Property from this set grants a passive income to the Owner, which they collect at the start of each Turn.
- When the entire Set is owned, Passive Income doubles instead of Rent.
- Rent is inverted; Anyone who lands on the property steals from the owner. Each House and Hotel lowers Rent.

desc:
Post 2
*There's nothing quite as nice as literally printing your own money. Too bad the security is so crap.*
